alert.note: Alert for O'Brien; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 6:23PM CDT until September 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern O`Brien County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 622 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sheldon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sheldon, Sanborn, Hospers, and Archer around 630 PM CDT. Primghar around 635 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
